description: Cook a pub-worthy beef pepper steak complete with sweet caramelised onion and a crisp Greek salad with tender potatoes in just 20 minutes.
keywords: Beef dishes,Quick & easy dinner,Potato salad,Weeknight dinner,Dinner Made Easy,Beef,Potato
name: Speedy Pepper Steak With Caramelised Onion & Greek Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 brown onions, thinly sliced into rings
400g Woolworths COOK baby potatoes with butter & herb

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook, covered, for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until onion has softened. Uncover and cook for a further 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until onion has caramelised.
Meanwhile, microwave potatoes according to packet instructions.

Heat a greased chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook steaks for 3 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate and cover loosely with foil to rest for 5 minutes.
Prepare salad according to packet instructions. Thickly slice potatoes and toss through salad. Place steaks on plates and top with caramelised onion. Divide salad among plates and serve with relish.
